title: McDonald's stock slammed as value menu loses its bite
text:
McDonald's stock slammed as value menu loses its bite 10:58pm GMT - 01:39 
Shares of McDonald's tumbled five percent in the stock's biggest one-day slide in roughly a decade after a Wall Street analyst questioned the success of the fast-food giant's updated value menu. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
